inputs.description: Enter the Cloudflare Tunnel URL (e.g., https://xxx.trycloudflare.com)

tasks.label: E2E: Set Tunnel URL
tasks.command: cd packages/e2e && cp -n .env.example .env 2>/dev/null; if grep -q '^VITE_API_URL=' .env; then sed -i 's|^VITE_API_URL=.*|VITE_API_URL=${input:tunnelUrl}|' .env; else echo 'VITE_API_URL=${input:tunnelUrl}' >> .env; fi && echo 'âœ” VITE_API_URL set to ${input:tunnelUrl}'
